metadata.title: CVE-2020-11034 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GLPI before version 9.4.6, there is a vulnerability that allowsbypassing the open redirect protection based which is based on a regexp.This is fixed in version 9.4.6.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
